#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
#define nik long long int
inline nik scam()
{
     nik n=0,neg=0,c=getchar_unlocked();
     while((c<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-')c=getchar_unlocked();
     if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=getchar_unlocked();}
     while(c>='0'&&c<='9')n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked();
     if(neg) n=-n;
     return n;
}
int main() 
{
	nik t=scam();
	while(t--)
	{
		nik n=scam();
		if(n<2) printf("NO\n");
		else if(n==2) printf("YES\n");
		else
		{
			if(n%4==1)
			{
				printf("YES\n");
			}
			else
			{
				printf("NO\n");
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
